page.title: 10GOLDSWORTH PARK, WOKING
page.content: Goldsworth Park,which is the largest housing development in Britain and is probably the largest in Europe,is soon to be completed.The 4,000th home is expected to be finished during the Autumn of 1986. The land on which the development is built was bought from Walter S.Slocock Ltd.in the early 1970's.Until that time,the whole area had been a very flourishing Nursery Garden which had specialized in the Goldsworth range of Azaleas and Rhododendrons. The land had to be drained and a 17 acre lake was created in the middle of the area.This is now being developed as a water sport amenity. Goldsworth Park has become a mini-new -town with its own schools,shops,pub, health centre and leisure centre. The Basingstoke Canal which forms the southern boundary is being restored.
